metadata.label: gs:Centroid
metadata.description: Computes the geometric centroids of features

metadata.label: gs:BufferFeatureCollection
metadata.description: Buffers features by a distance value supplied either as a parameter or by a feature attribute. Calculates buffers based on Cartesian distances.

inputs.name: distance
inputs.description: Fixed value to use for the buffer distance

inputs.name: attributeName
inputs.description: Attribute containing the buffer distance value

metadata.label: gs:IntersectionFeatureCollection
metadata.description: Spatial intersection of two feature collections, incuding combining attributes from both.

inputs.name: first attributes to retain
inputs.description: First feature collection attribute to include

inputs.name: second attributes to retain
inputs.description: Second feature collection attribute to include

inputs.name: intersectionMode
inputs.description: Specifies geometry computed for intersecting features.  INTERSECTION (default) computes the spatial intersection of the inputs. FIRST copies geometry A.  SECOND copies geometry B.

inputs.name: percentagesEnabled
inputs.description: Indicates whether to output feature area percentages (attributes percentageA and percentageB)

inputs.name: areasEnabled
inputs.description: Indicates whether to output feature areas (attributes areaA and areaB)

metadata.label: gs:Length
metadata.description: Returns the total length of all line segments in a geometry. Measurement is given in the source units, so geographic coordinates are not recommended....Robert Ouko
